casebody.data:
Jaime Duarte SIERRA
v.
Eric A. HOOKS, Secretary, North Carolina Department of Public Safety, Division of Prisons, et al., Timothy McKoy, Superintendent, Franklin Correctional Center No. 93A93-5 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 21, 2018 Jaime Duarte Sierra, for Sierra, Jaime Duarte. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 20th of September 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Lee County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of September 2018."
